suppress.notes: last present in 24.1; fixed in 24.1.1 and 25.0
CVE-2018-1258: we do not use Spring Method Security, so this does not affect us. see https://pivotal.io/security/cve-2018-1258
We are using SecureRandom without a custom seed so not affected. This will however be fixed with spring boot 2.1.4 upgrade which is using spring-security.* of 5.1.5 or higher
This is exploitable in com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariConfig and com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource which we do not use. Pending the release of a stable jackson databind version (>2.9.9.3)
